revised_title: Corrections and Additions to Volume 17 Part 1
tldr: This article provides corrections and additions to Volume 17 Part 1 of the Notes and Records of the Royal Society of London. It includes an obituary for Sir James Irvine Masson and corrects some errors and misinterpretations in the previous volume, such as a Latin motto and a date in the heading.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
